website_summaries.verdict: Reebok Sprint 2.0 was one of the brand’s early attempts at creating a versatile shoe for the CrossFit community needs. It was well-received as a general-purpose gym shoe but was not recommended for heavy-duty use mainly due to lack of stability and durability issues.Although the shoe was discontinued in 2017, it helped Reebok gain experience to create a more technologically-advanced Nano trainer.
pros: A good number of testers describe Sprint 2.0 as a comfortable cross-trainer
Most users agree that this CrossFit shoe from Reebok delivers support for moderate weightlifting and HIIT workouts
Its rubber outsole offers reliable grip on gym floors, as stated by some reviews
The trainer feels light on the foot, according to several reviews
cons: More than a few buyers have reported that the sole came unglued after only a few weeks of moderate use
Not everyone is a fan of the plasticky material which covers the upper
Several wearers complain about the shoe producing a slight squeak

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: Product runs just a little small, but after break in they're a lot better. But I recommend going up a half size, especially if you have wider feet. You can loosen the laces and it'll not be so tight on you, but you'll have to play around with it to keep your heel in place. The shoes seem very durable and are a great platform to preform Olympic lifts with.
customer_reviews.author: Weston

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them at first but now I do
customer_reviews.text: These shoes turned out to be great training shoes! They're comfy and keep you agile. Not meant for running nor sprinting but they're great for bodybuilding, crossfit, punching bag and jump rope. I didn't find them appealing in looks when I first received them because how thin some parts are and how plasticky they looked. Take note that they are narrow but to me it was no biggie. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: GU

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a little trouble finding the right running shoe for me. I was either given ones that were too slime to too wide, or just terrible material for the price. This brand really grabbed my attention and gave me what I wanted. I though it was going to be too tight but the width was just wide enough, without going overboard. They slip on comfortably and don't feel awkward when working out in them. The only issue was that the soles seemed a bit thin but it's nothing a simple replacement didn't fix. I will definitely buy from Reebok again if this is how they make running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my son who. He loves them. They are not as narrow as they look through the arch area, and he had lots of room in the toe box for his wider-than-average foot. Light weight but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Reebok's!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect fit for my narrow foot. Very comfy! My first pair of Reebok's in over thirty years! So happy with my purchase and I can't wait to workout in them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Joseph Mancillas

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy, i bought them a week ago. However the top of the ripped. I don't think it's the shoe, probably just my dog stepping on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great WOD shoes besides the fact that my foot slips ...
customer_reviews.text: Great WOD shoes besides the fact that my foot slips out in the back when I do like lunges or like mountain climbers. Other than that they are nice. I had to buy different insoles. I bought mine from footlocker. Other than that they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been searching for a show like you.
customer_reviews.text: I like this model, but it is a discontinued style. I’m very grateful to find it. Perfect fit for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: AggretsukoFan

customer_reviews.title: I have a womans pair and love mine as well
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves to wear these for our crossfit workouts. he says they help him stay in his heels for his lifts. I have a womans pair and love mine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: ... because I own the previous year's model and I loved them. These ones seem to be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I own the previous year's model and I loved them. These ones seem to be a little looser and the rubberized material on the exterior seems cheaper and stiffer. They don't seem to fit as well and the stiffer exterior makes them "contort" weirdly when I move my foot around. I guess they will do for my purposes but I won't buy a 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The width
customer_reviews.text: I bit tight as the side , I didn’t really consider the width when purchasing, hope it breaks in , length is good
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: But are good for all workouts
customer_reviews.text: Use it mainly on workout that need to run. But are good for all workouts. Fitment is like any other running shoe (comfortable) , not as wide as NANO 3.0 series (which are extra wide).
customer_reviews.author: O. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: VERY narrow! At least a size too small!!! Very light, but almost feel fragile. Disappointed in these Reebok's.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vick

customer_reviews.title: True To Size
customer_reviews.text: These are for real running shoes. They fit well, and are durable. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Reylo

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of narrow in the middle, definitely not for running. Great for crossfit.
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, they are really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as expected. Great quality, they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeny Teheran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on the sides. Seems they may tun a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. I do crossfit and boxing and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I do crossfit and boxing and the shoe works great for that. I typically wear running shoes when out for a run. Looks and feels grear. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jwiedrich

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable, but love the look.
customer_reviews.text: As a personal trainer who wears mostly minimal footwear, I find these shoes very uncomfortable to be in for extended periods of time. I bought them for the style so I'm keeping them. However I couldn't imagine working out in these. They're strictly for wearing during short shifts. Yes I'm that vein!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but....
customer_reviews.text: Really bad shoe. Feels smaller and less durable. I hardly use it for crossfit anymore. Doesn't feel like a good shoe. I should have returned it when I got it but I really needed a shoe at that time.
customer_reviews.author: devon kenger

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but not for real athletics.  4 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, but the sole is very thin. Almost like wearing sandals. No arch support to speak of. These are for simple every day wear. These are NOT professional sports shoes. So get them for the styling, but wear good socks and insoles, and don't expect to run marathons in them and they should do OK for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody Special

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Reebok fits as expected, thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Panduro

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens R Crossfit Sprint 2-
product_meta.description: Traditional lace-up closure ensures a dialed-in fit. Anti-friction lining helps reduce moisture and heat build-up to keep feet dry and cool. Heat-activated U-Form mid-foot wrap molds to the foot for a custom fit with no break-in period. Syntehtic sole increases durability and traction. Imported.
